Home

Introduction

Mojo-grasp is a framework that aims to make grasping simulations faster and easier to implement in pybullet. It offers helper functions, project templates, a state machine and Reinforcement learning support. It helps you get started with projects faster, and provides structure. This is an ongoing effort, so broad changes may still happen.

Installation

After cloning repository run:

pip3 install -e .

This will install mojo-grasp as well as pybullet.

Usage

We recommend that you begin by looking through the two demos on the github to get a general sense of how a project is structured, and the pieces that you will need. We also provide a project template that can be found here: Project Template Repo
